mapper.select: select max(ORDER_NUM) from ORDER_LIST where to_char(ORDER_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD')=#{nowDate}

select ORDERLIST.ORDER_NUM, ORDERLIST.MENU, ORDERLIST.TEMPERATURE, ORDERLIST.BEVERAGE_SIZE, ORDERLIST.SHOT, ORDERLIST.SYRUB, ORDERLIST.WHIPPING, ORDERLIST.PRICE, ORDERLIST.ORDER_DATE, PAY.POINT, PAY.CARD, PAY.CASH, PAY.TOTAL from((select ORDER_NUM, MENU, TEMPERATURE, BEVERAGE_SIZE, SHOT, SYRUB, WHIPPING, PRICE, ORDER_DATE from ORDER_LIST where to_char(ORDER_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD')=#{orderDate} and order_num = #{orderNum}) ORDERLIST left outer join (select ORDER_NUM, POINT, CARD, CASH, TOTAL from payment where to_char(ORDER_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD')=#{orderDate} and order_num = #{orderNum}) PAY on ORDERLIST.ORDER_NUM = PAY.ORDER_NUM)
